gg141094693zoo5793.hint: Oh, you think you can just turn the lights back on, eh? No chance! I've hidden all of the light patterns and you'll never find them. Well, except for this one. Not even your little DisCo ball badge can help you start the party now!

bb194109570zgg9412475.hint: Bah, that one was easy. You're welcome. But don't think you can just walk around to all the other tables and turn the lights on that way!

rrr41zbbb94zggg1093zooo41zyyy94737.hint: Gah! I thought I left that booklet on the /metro. These laser colors are damaging my eyes. No matter, I'll hide my keys more carefully next time, there's no easy path here!

yyy79435704794zrrr373195.hint: Lights everywhere! That projector has even more light in it than all of those silly villages combined!

yyyy79459364794359395.hint: Bwahaha! â€œLight modeâ€, huh? What a joke, but fine, leave your tiny light on. Just don't get aheader yourself, I still hold a lot of the light!

r41zb94zg1295zo41zyyy9469295740.hint: That's it, I'm firing my laser guy.

o41493496zy94692705794zrrr37941924.hint: Stop following those lasers! I control the light, you'll never collect enough watts to start the party.

bb1941949649204957040.hint: So what, you found a few of my hiding places. But while you've been running around I've gotten into the DisCo website, it'll be mine soon!

rrzrzrzrzrzrzrzrzrrzrzrrzrzrrzrrzrr.hint: So you found another one of my codes, eh? No matter, I have many more! Although the logostics of keeping them all straight is getting tricky. Maybe I should hide some data inside some filesâ€¦

r7r4r1b70b940b1g94g10g4o5o4o3y94y7y4.hint: I hate the light, but I do love to dance! Too bad all those disco balls on the dance floor are like kryptonite, so many awful, shiny panels. Why can't all the panels be dark?!

y9474194zo39647094295zg94102792zb1941947.hint: Blast, I thought I hid that one really well. Fine, maybe you've got some hacking skills after all, but it's gonna take a village to solve all of my puzzles!

b94010293zzy7945793zzooo3570594310.hint: Your village friends may have helped you, but not enough! Wait, where was that last laser pointing? Nevermind, ignore that!

o35705zb94952095.hint: Okay, this is getting ridiculous. Why can't you just quit! Maybe I need to try a different encoding scheme. I better jot this down in the logs.

rrzzrrrzrrzzrzzzrrr.hint: I love this song... but don't tell anyone. Can't remember who plays it, thoughâ€¦?

rzrrrzzr.hint: HOW DO YOU KEEP DOING THIS?!? Is this a game to you?? Whatâ€¦ is this a game? Am I in a game?!? Who made it??
